product_name: YETI Rambler 26 oz Bottle, Vacuum Insulated, Stainless Steel with Color Matching Straw Cap, King Crab
description: Housing 26 ounces of thirst quenching power and made to fit in your backpack, this one’s been dubbed the goldilocks of the YETI Bottle line. And with the leak-resistant YETI Straw Cap, you’ve got a bottle made for every day, easy sippin’. It’s your on-hand hydration during all-day waterfront ventures, long hikes, and midsummer heat waves. Like the rest of the YETI Rambler Family, it’s built with double-wall vacuum insulation to keep drinks cold all day, comes in DuraCoat colors that won’t peel or crack, and has a YETI TripleHaul Handle for easy carries. To top it off, it’s dishwasher safe for quick cleans while you plan your next venture. Note: Do not use the YETI Rambler Bottle Straw Cap with hot, carbonated, or pulpy beverages or for storage of food or perishables.

latest_reviews.title: Kids love them!
latest_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a reliable, stylish, and high-performing bottle for daily use or outdoor adventures, the YETI Rambler 26 oz Bottle is a fantastic investment. We bought these for our children aged 8 and 10 and they’re the perfect size for drinking water during the day. They keep your water cold and ice cubes are still going the next day!

latest_reviews.title: Best bottle ever
latest_reviews.text: Ease of carrying, ease of cleaning cold retention and very good quality

latest_reviews.title: Great water bottle
latest_reviews.text: Good size, sturdy,easy to use,keeps cold a long time. Only need one of these to do the job!

latest_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
latest_reviews.text: The colour is really nice and it keeps drinks cold and the sstraw is excellent for drinking water at the gym or in the car..

latest_reviews.title: I waited too long to buy one!
latest_reviews.text: Best water bottle. I waited too long to buy one as I have been using a cheaper version....

latest_reviews.title: Great product
latest_reviews.text: As advised. Nice bright colour, came with two bendable straws.

latest_reviews.title: Durable
latest_reviews.text: I really like the colour and of course the fact that the yeti keeps everything hot or cold for a long time
